thread.title: Amazing stay at A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing stay at A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel - Review of A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: sophval96
title: Amazing stay at A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel
text:
This hotel is one of the best hotels we have stayed in, the room was generously sized with bath/shower room and a separate toilet which is always handy!
The mini bar was stocked with complimentary drinks / snacks which was topped up daily. The food in the restaurant was good value for money only €25 for all you can eat and unlimited soft drink refreshments.
The hotel provide a shuttle to get to the centre of Rome for only as little as €2 per journey and the time frames where great as there was no need to rush!
We will definitely be visiting again soon!
